item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

8. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (38 points | 6 comments)

10. A simple live calculator with tree-sitter + cranelift jit (28 points | no comments)
11. React 19 is now stable (4 points | no comments)
